channel.title: Need help with slayer
channel.description:
Ok I want It so that the only way on my server you can train slayer is by killing a high monster
(Sugestions please on which monster it should be)
How would I be able to add syaler xp given when its killed for example
I kill "Black Knight Titan" And am rewarded drop and 500k slayer xp
Is there anyway I can add slayer xp it just like on rs
